title: CANDYLAND
lyrics:
(Come on baby
What you say we take off and a
Hit up CANDYLAND
Take care of that sweet tooth
Come on!)

Geobuhal su eobs-eo naui sonjis-e

Pug ppajyeodeulgo iss-eo neoui nunbich-e

Nungwa gwileul dad-a ibsul wie naega dah-eul ttae

Chokollisgat-i dalkom ssabssaleumhan

Sigan-eul seonmulhaejulge woo



Nan sasil teugbyeolhan geos-eman ban-eunghae

Jigeumkkeos neukkyeossdeon geos jung-e choegodwae

Hogsi gwaenhan ohae malgo

Ileon naleul midgo

Neodo naege kkeullindamyeon follow



Niga naleul umjig-yeo amu yego eobs-i

Naega neoleul heundeul-eo balo geochim-eobs-i

Ni siseon-i budijhyeo nun-eul ttel su eobs-i

Ijebuteo naege lose control



We don’t stop naege dagawa

Dalkomhan jungdog pop pop pop

Bwa bwa ppajyeodeul-eo bwa

Neoleul chodaehalge CANDYLAND

We don’t stop naleul mid-eobwa

Dalkomhan mas-ui hot hot hot

Bwa bwa ppajyeo deul-eoga

Neoleul wihan naui CANDYLAND



Nog-anaelin chokollis pongdyu

Neon geu an-eul heeomchyeo

Amu geogjeonghaji ma

Niga wonhamyeon da haejulge



Dalbich chanlanhan bam neoui gwie sogsag-yeojulge

Chosbul-i taoleuneun sigan dong-an

Ni mam-eun modu nae geoya



Naega wonhaneun geon neo hanamyeon chungbunhae

Milgo tto dang-gineun geon sigan nangbi ttabunhae

Sunjinhan cheog anin cheog geuleon geon ttag silh-eohae

Michin deus-i simjang-i yodongchineunde



Niga naleul umjig-yeo amu yego eobs-i

Naega neoleul heundeul-eo balo geochim-eobs-i

Ni siseon-i budijhyeo nun-eul ttel su eobs-i

Ijebuteo naege lose control



We don’t stop naege dagawa

Dalkomhan jungdog pop pop pop

Bwa bwa ppajyeodeul-eo bwa

Neoleul chodaehalge CANDYLAND

We don’t stop naleul mid-eobwa

Dalkomhan mas-ui hot hot hot

Bwa bwa ppajyeo deul-eoga

Neoleul wihan naui CANDYLAND



La la la la la la nan neoman-ui CANDYLAND

La la la la la la chodaehalge CANDYLAND



Jogeum deo faster wiheomhae so danger

Chulag jeon-ui byeolang kkeut-e lolleokoseuteo

Aseul-aseul witaeloun ni gibun-eun chillin

Swibji anh-eun ni ma-eum-eun na-egeman heolaghae



We don’t stop naege dagawa

Dalkomhan jungdog pop pop pop

Bwa bwa jigeum i sungan

Ppajyeodeulgo mal geol CANDYLAND

We don’t stop naleul mid-eobwa

Dalkomhan mas-ui hot hot hot

Bwa bwa neoleul matgyeobwa

Neoleul delyeogalge CANDYLAND



La la la la la la dalkomhan kkum CANDYLAND

La la la la la la nae ibsul-eun CANDYLAND

La la la la la la neoleul wihan CANDYLAND

La la la la la la Welcome to my CANDYLAND
